metadata.name: Queen of the night
metadata.description:
Epiphyllum Oxypetalum, or Night-Blooming Cereus, is one of the rarest plants to live in the desert and blooms only one night a year. The bloom, nicknamed the ‘Queen of the Night’, will arrive sometime between sunset and midnight on a summer night, usually on or close to a full moon. 

Digital painting, 2022  
61,8 MB  
5000 x 7078 px  
LH
